body: This WHOLE needs translations, not just chapter 1-4!!!

Came here hoping for the other guy to make a comeback from the shambles that was page 98, was thoroughly disappointed my guy lost both the girls to a twat, gonna go back to manhwas the ntr atleast got revenge over there fuck this place nice guys always finish last over here xD
for anyone who wants to see this book translated, please check out my website for crowdfunding Project: https://hmctranslation.wordpress.com/

Well its not actually so nice when you factor in the fact that the Student President uses the slutty glasses girl to drive a wedge between the other girl and her child hood friend whom she has a crush on. The president's plan, once girl see that her childhood friend who she likes is banging another girl she'll need a rebound and he'll be there to grab her. It works and the President gets the girl, she become addicted to sex but is forever haunted by not being able to give her first time to crush goes on a downward spiral. In the end both the girls are little more then play things for the President. That whole swinger scene wasn't 2 bros sharing that was just the president showing he'd didn't give a fuck really since he already beat the other guy to both of them.
So all the way to page 98, do these guy share the girls like one dude has them for the weekend and another for the weekdays, cuz if so then that's pretty neat.
Wow, this looks pretty nice. I'll keep a mental note of it in hopes of translations.
